title: FS: T206 Zimmermann Yellow Color Shift - SOLD
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Zimmermann Yellow Color Shift - SOLD
posts.post_content:
The yellow pass on this card is shifted considerably to the right (player's left).  It reveals that the orange background is comprised of a mix of yellow and pink, and that the grass is obviously a mix of blue and yellow.  Unfortunately the shift isn't great enough to discern the player on the adjacent card.

Asking $75 delivered; paypal preferred.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/raw-for-sale/7689/zimmermann[/IMG]

That's a cool card.  I'll take it.

Rob
